inputs.remark: 缺少V2 验配，V3 2周follow up，V4 11个月follow up

logic_summary: Added V2 encounter for the fitting of custom ITE sound generators.
Added V3 encounter for the 2-week follow-up visit.
Added V4 encounter for the 11-month follow-up visit including LDLs, TRQ, and subjective ratings.

history.present_illness: Patient returned for fitting of sound generators.
history.treatment_plan: Fitted bilaterally with General Hearing Instruments, Inc. custom ITE white-noise sound generators. Recommended protocol: wear for at least 8 hours/day, gradually increasing to Comfortable Listening Level (CLL).

history.outcome: Patient reported the sound generators seemed to be helping and did not exacerbate her headaches.
Patient reported wearing sound generators consistently for 7 months, now 30-60 minutes/day. Tinnitus no longer interferes with sleep. No longer taking headache medications.
history.tinnitus_status: Awareness reduced to 10% of awake time; disturbance reduced to 5%.

tests.name: Loudness Discomfort Levels (LDLs)
tests.key_findings: Significant improvement in loudness tolerance; LDLs > 90 dB HL.

tests.name: Tinnitus Reaction Questionnaire (TRQ)
tests.key_findings: Score reduced to 3, indicating no significant disturbance.

tests.name: Subjective Tinnitus Ratings
tests.key_findings: Significant reduction in awareness and disturbance.
